OR( (ISPICKVAL( [Case].Incident_Status__c,"Awaiting Agent Assignment" ) && ISCHANGED([Case].OwnerId ) && LEFT(PRIORVALUE([Case].OwnerId ),3 )= '00G' && ([Case].RecordType.Name = 'Community User Record Type')) ,(ISCHANGED([Case].OwnerId) && ISCHANGED([Case].Incident_Status__c) && ([Case].RecordType.Name = 'Community User Record Type')) ,(ISCHANGED([Case].Incident_Status__c) && OR(ISPICKVAL( [Case].Incident_Status__c,"Resolved (Temp Workaround)" ), ISPICKVAL( [Case].Incident_Status__c,"Resolved (Permanently)" ), ISPICKVAL( [Case].Incident_Status__c,"Resolved (No Customer Response)" ), ISPICKVAL( [Case].Incident_Status__c,"Closed" )) && ([Case].RecordType.Name = 'Community User Record Type')) )

formulas.name: formula_myRule_1
formulas.expression: OR( (ISPICKVAL( {!myVariable_current.Incident_Status__c},"Awaiting Agent Assignment" ) && ISCHANGED({!myVariable_current.OwnerId} ) && LEFT(PRIORVALUE({!myVariable_current.OwnerId} ),3 )= '00G' && ({!myVariable_current.RecordType.Name} = 'Community User Record Type')) ,(ISCHANGED({!myVariable_current.OwnerId}) && ISCHANGED({!myVariable_current.Incident_Status__c}) && ({!myVariable_current.RecordType.Name} = 'Community User Record Type')) ,(ISCHANGED({!myVariable_current.Incident_Status__c}) && OR(ISPICKVAL( {!myVariable_current.Incident_Status__c},"Resolved (Temp Workaround)" ), ISPICKVAL( {!myVariable_current.Incident_Status__c},"Resolved (Permanently)" ), ISPICKVAL( {!myVariable_current.Incident_Status__c},"Resolved (No Customer Response)" ), ISPICKVAL( {!myVariable_current.Incident_Status__c},"Closed" )) && ({!myVariable_current.RecordType.Name} = 'Community User Record Type')) )

Flow.label: Service Cloud: Track Case Lifecycle History
